mapper.select: SELECT cwd.timing, cwd.course_type, count(*) AS quantity FROM payment_with_detail AS pwd INNER JOIN course_with_detail AS cwd ON pwd.course_id = cwd.course_id INNER JOIN ticket AS t ON t.payment_id = pwd.payment_id WHERE pwd.status = 'PAID' AND t.meal_id IS NULL AND pwd.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY cwd.timing, cwd.course_type

SELECT t.ticket_id FROM payment_with_detail AS pwd INNER JOIN course_with_detail AS cwd ON pwd.course_id = cwd.course_id INNER JOIN ticket AS t ON t.payment_id = pwd.payment_id WHERE pwd.status = 'PAID' AND t.meal_id IS NULL AND pwd.member_id = #{payment.memberId} AND cwd.timing = #{course.timing} AND cwd.course_type = #{course.courseType} ORDER BY pwd.paid_at LIMIT 1
